revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Radxa |model=Rock Pi 3 |revision=A (RS117-D4) V1.31 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Currently Shipping |price=55 |est_release_date=07/2021 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB (Type-C) Female |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3568 |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25U12832F |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H9HCNNNCPMML <!---HRNME --> |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, NGFF (M.2), USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, via GPIO header,, (1500000 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Power Management IC;Rockchip;RK809-5;;1;,,, PCI Express Clock;Diodes Inc;PI6C557-03;;1;,,, I2C RTC;Haoyu Microelectronics;HYM8563;;1;,,, 16Kb Serial EEPROM;Shanghai Belling;BL24C16A;;1;,,, USB PD Power Receiving Protocol Chip;WCH;CH224;;1;,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1;,,, 5A Synchronous Step-Down DC-DC Converter;Tctek;TCS4525;;1;,,, 4.8A Charging IC w/ Fast Charging Protocol;Injoinic Tech;IP2315;;1;,,, 4-Lines Directional Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semi;ESD5344;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;Union Semi;UM3204;;1;,,, 5V 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ 100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, 18V 5A Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;STC;SCT2250;;2;,,, <!-- Silicon Content Tech --> 2A 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8089;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;4;,,, High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;2; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.0, Audio out (3.5mm), RTC, eMMC module socket, PoE expansion header, ADC, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, SPI, I2C, UART, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2017.09; |stock_os=Linux;4.19.193;Debian 10; |tp_firmware=Android 11, Armbian (unofficial), Manjaro ARM |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=rock |default_pass=rock }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://wiki.radxa.com/Rock3/3a Product page]
"ROCK 3A V1.31", "radxa" and "Toybrick" are silkscreened on board top.
{{See also|Radxa|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3568 Quad-Core @2.0GHz :SoC: ARM (Cortex-A55); NPU: 0.8 TOPS *GPU: ''Mali-G52'' (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16MB (SPI) Flash, eMMC module connector, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card, NVMe SSD (M.2) slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM @1560MHz (''[[SK hynix]]'') *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 3.0 (OTG), 2x USB 2.0 ports *PCIe: 1x M.2 (M key) socket, 1x M.2 (E key) socket *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port (w/ PoE support) *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB Type-C (supporting USB PD 2.0) :and Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0
===Links=== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/pi-like-rk3568-sbc-grows-sata-out-of-its-usb-ports/ ''Pi-like RK3568 SBC grows SATA out of its USB ports'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/07/19/rock-3a-sbc-nvme-ssd-wifi-6-raspberry-pi-form-factor/ ''ROCK 3A SBC brings M.2 slots for NVMe SSD, WiFi 6'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==Images== <gallery> File:Radxa Rock 3A (RS117-D4) Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Radxa Rock 3A (RS117-D4) Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
